A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: underdeveloped dialogue\, too much jumping around\, and scenes that are cut too short. focused on too many characters who didn't deserve the time. felt like watching a TV show but worse. the director should've ashamed and Kathleen Kennedy should be fired. you have forgotten what it's all about...the story.. there is no story here\, and if there is it's weak and boring...
